Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game

Class HUD

java.lang.Object
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.RenderLayer
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.HUD
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Drawable>
public abstract class HUD extends RenderLayer
Provides an overlay designed for being displayed on a Window over a Scene.

  • Constructor Details

    • HUD

      public HUD()
      Creates an empty HUD.

  • Method Details

    • empty

      public static HUD empty()
      Creates a "null" HUD with empty RenderLayer.init() method.

    • fullInit

      @Contract("-> fail") public final void fullInit()
      Performs the full HUD initialization, i.a. calls the RenderLayer.init() method. This method should not be invoked manually.

    • refresh

      public void refresh(@NotNull @NotNull Window window)
      Draws every object on the window. This method is automatically executed every frame by the window it belongs to and should not be invoked manually. If this HUD contains AnimatedEntitys or AnimatedEntitys, their animation methods will be called with the currently set Scene's getDeltaTime() method.
      Parameters:
      window - the window that the scene has to be displayed on
